line.text:
Planned Work

[2] Trains run local in both directions between 34 St-Penn Station and Chambers St

Weekend, 10 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 27 - 30

• Please allow additional travel time.
_______________________________


[2] Flatbush Av-bound trains run express from E 180 St to 3 Av-149 St

Weekend, 4 AM Sat to 10 PM Sun, Jan 28 - 29

For service to E Tremont Av, 174, Freeman, Simpson Sts, Intervale, Prospect and Jackson Avs,
take the [2] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a 241 St-bound [2] or Dyre Av-bound [5].

For service from these stations, take the [2] or [5] to E 180 St and transfer to a Flatbush Av-bound [2].

    This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  

_______________________________


[3] No service between 34 St-Penn Station and New Lots Av

[2] [4] Trains provide alternate service
Weekend, 10 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 27 - 30

Trains run express between 148 St and 34 St-Penn Station all weekend.

[2] trains make all [3] stops between Times Sq-42 St and Franklin Av.
[4] trains make all [3] stops between Franklin and New Lots Avs.

• Transfer between [2] and [3] trains at Times Sq-42 St.
• Transfer between [2] and [4] trains at Franklin Av.

Note: [4] service is extended to New Lots Av and runs local in Brooklyn during this time.

    This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  

__________________________________

making local stops at Bergen St, Grand Army Plaza, Eastern Pkwy, Nostrand
and Kingston Avs.

7:30 AM to 11:30 PM Sun, Jan 29

7:30 AM to 10 PM Sun, Jan 29

take the [5] to 149 St-Grand Concourse and transfer to a 241 St-bound [2] or Dyre Av-bound [5].

line.text:
Planned Work

[7] No trains between Queensboro Plaza and Times Sq-42 St

[E] [F] [N] [S] trains and free shuttle buses provide alternate service
Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Jan 28 - 30

[7] service operates between Main St and Queensboro Plaza.

Travel Alternatives

• Take the [N] at Times Sq or Queensboro Plaza.
• Take the [E] at 74 St-Roosevelt Av, Court Sq-23 St, 42 St-Port Authority or Lexington Av-53 St.
• Free shuttle buses provide alternate service at Queensboro Plaza, Queens Plaza [E], Court Sq,
  Hunters Point Av and Vernon Blvd-Jackson Av Stations.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work

[A] Trains run local in both directions between 145 St and 168 St

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Jan 28 - 30  •  Feb 4 - 6

• Please allow additional travel time.

Notes: No [C] trains between 145 and 168 Sts during this time.
           This service change is scheduled to operate until Mar 19.
_______________________________


[C] No trains between 145 St and 168 St

Weekend, Saturday and Sunday, Jan 28 - 29

Service operates between Euclid Av and 145 St.

• Take the [A] instead.

Notes: [A] trains run local in both directions between 145 and 168 Sts during this time.
           This service change is scheduled to operate until Mar 19.

    This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Note: No uptown [E] service at Spring and 23 Sts.

    This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

Weekend, 12:01 AM Sat to 5 AM Mon, Jan 28 - 30

to a World Trade Center-bound [E].

For service from these stations, take the [E] to 14 or Canal Sts and
transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [E].

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  8:08AM

B47 buses detoured and delayed due to track work at Broadway and Ralph Avenue.

Detour is as follows:

Northbound: Via Ralph Av, left at Gates Av, right at Patchen Av, left at Broadway and then regular route.

Southbound: Via Broadway, right at Patchen Av, left at Gates Av, right at Ralph Av and then regular route.

Please allow extra time for travel.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:48AM

Bx39 bus detour southbound, due to construction.

Via White Plains Road stop at the near side of Pelham Parkway (BXM 11 stop)

Right turn Pelham Parkway, left Boston Road into White Plains Road and regular route.

Use all Bx22 stops while on detour.

Â Please allow additional travel time.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:45AM

Bx30 buses being rerouted.

All times

The new reroute provides a one-bus connection serving Asch Loop,
Baychester Av, the northern part of Co-op City Blvd, Dreiser Loop
and Section 5, at all times.

The Bx30 will no longer make stops on Bartow Av between Asch
Loop and Co-op City Blvd.

line.name: BXM1 - BXM18
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:45AM

BxM4 buses stop change.

Effective, Sunday, Jan 8

Bus stops are being discontinued and will travel along the
main Grand Concourse roadway.

Discontinued bus stops:
-E 206 St (northbound) - Van Cortlandt Av (southbound)
-E 198 St (northbound) - Minerva Pl (southbound)
-E 182 St (northbound and southbound)
-Mt Eden Av (northbound and southbound)

Customers currently using these bus stops may walk to nearby
bus stops or use the Bx1 or Bx2 and transfer to the BxM4 at no
additional charge when using a Pay Per Ride Metrocard.

All other BxM4 bus stops in the Bronx and Manhattan remain
unchanged.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:47AM

Q32 bus detour eastbound, due to FDNY activity on E 59 St, btn 3 and 2 Av.

Eastbound - via E 59 St, left on 3 Av, right on E 65 St, right on 2 Av, left onto the 59 St Bridge and regular route.

Please allow additional travel time.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:47AM

Q21 buses route change.

All times

Buses are being rerouted to Arverne and operating weekday peak period
limited-stop service.

Buses will travel east of the Cross Bay Bridge to Beach 69 St in Arverne,
instead on west to Rockaway Park.

Weekday Peak-Period Limited-Stop Service:
There will be limited-stop service between Arverne and Elmhurst, running
during the weekday peak period in peak direction only.

Q21 limited will operate northbound 5:45 am - 7:45 am and southbound
4:22 pm - 6:22 pm on weekdays.

The Q21 limited will serve the same bus stops as the Q53 limited between
Broad Channel and Elmhurst, including bypassing Lindenwood, also making
limited-stops on Rockaway Beach Blvd.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:46AM

Q40 buses rerouted.

All times

Buses are being detoured from 140 St, then will travel on 143 St
between 135 Av and Rockaway Blvd in both directions as follows:

Southbound: Regular route on 143 St from Rockaway Blvd, then make
the last stop on 143 St at 135 Av.

Northbound: From first stop on 135 Av at 142 St, left on 143 St, left on
Rockaway Blvd, right on 142 St and regular route.

New Southbound stop:
143 St at 135 Av

Discontinued Southbound bus stop:
135 Av at 140 St

New Northbound stops:
135 Av at 142 St
143 St at 133 Av
143 St at 130 Av
143 St at Sutter Av
Rockaway Blvd at 143 St

Discontinued Northbound bus stops:
135 Av at 140 St
140 St at 130 Av
140 St at Sutter Av
Rockaway Blvd at 140 St

â€¢ Please allow additional travel time.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:46AM

Q65 bus route change.

All times

Buses will continue along 14 Rd to the new terminal on 110 St at 15 Av.

Service to the old terminal on 14 Av and the old bus stop on 110 St will
be discontinued.

â€¢ Please allow additional travel time.

Planned Detour  Posted: 01/10/2012 12:00AM
Q39 bus stops temporarily eliminated

All times

Bus stops are being temporarily eliminated due to overhead track work
on 23 St between 44 Dr and Jackson Av. Changes are as follows:

Ridgewood-bound temporary bus stops:
1. 44 Dr at Hunter St
2. Jackson Av at 23 St

Queens Plaza-bound temporary bus stop:
45 Av at 23 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: QM1 - QM25
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:47AM

QM2, QM3, QM20 bus detour eastbound, due to ongoing FDNY activity on 59 St btn 3 Av and 2 Av.

Eastbound - Via E 57 St, left onto the upper level of the 59 street bridge,Â right onto 21 St, right onto Queens Plaza S, right on 28 St, left on 42 Rd, left on Jackson Av and regular route.

There will be no bus stops missed along the detour.

Please allow additional travel time.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:45AM

QM16 bus route change.

Effective, Monday, Dec 5

Bus service to the Roxbury terminal on Beach 169 St at Rockaway Point Blvd
Blvd will be terminated and a new terminal established on Rockaway Beach Blvd
at Jacob Riis Park.

Discontinued bus stop:
Beach 169 St at Rockaway Point Blvd

New bus stop:
Rockaway Beach Blvd at Jacob Riis Park

line.name: x1 - x68
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:46AM

X17C bus schedule change.

Effective, Monday, Jan 9

Weekday schedule change.

The last southbound bus from East 57 St at 3 Av will leave at 12 midnight.

Service Change  Posted: 01/28/2012  5:44AM

The X22A begins bus service between Tottenville and 57th Street in Manhattan on January 30th, 2012

line.name: West Hempstead
line.text:
LIRR- West Hempstead

There is no weekend/holiday service on the West Hempstead Branch.  As an alternative, customers are advised to use the Hempstead, Lynbrook, Valley Stream or Merillon Avenue stations (all located in Fare Zone 4).
